document.full_text: a 7-year-old girl was beaten unconscious by a man with a lengthy criminal record who tried to steal her bicycle in broad daylight, the anchorage police department said on monday.
document.title: seven-year-old girl beaten by man trying to steal bike
lines_and_colors: a 7-year-old girl was beaten unconscious by a man with a lengthy criminal record who tried to steal her bicycle in broad daylight, the anchorage police department said on monday.
